summary: Set of crafting gear that any player with 100 Enchanting and Alchemy and the right perks can make. Total of 116% bonus to potions and improvement of weapons and armor. Currently can only be added via Console. The gear cannot be disenchanted or crafted.
descriptionHtml:
I think I uploaded the mod correctly...

Artificer\'s Gear...
Set of crafting gear that any player with 100 Enchanting and Alchemy and the right perks can make. Total of 116% bonus to potions and improvement of weapons and armor. Currently can only be added via Console. The gear cannot be disenchanted or crafted. 

In the future...
I\'m working on a quest line that gives the items as rewards. 

Why?!?!?
My main characters main quest story line got bugged because of conflicts with the civil war quest line and after many attempts to finish quests, reset quests, and just flat out skip quests, that game is useless and I had to restart. Making this mod was easier than making the gear. I also figured it might be useful to share.
author: MDKepner
